title: Smart Data Models - GovGAST1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified single shaft gas turbine.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovGAST1

a.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine power time constant numerator scale factor (a).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

b.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine power time constant denominator scale factor (b).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

db1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional dead-band width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

db2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unintentional dead-band (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

eps.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

fidle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel flow at zero power output (Fidle).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0.0

gv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 1, PU gv (Gv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 2,PU gv (Gv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 3, PU gv (Gv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 4, PU gv (Gv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 5, PU gv (Gv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 6, PU gv (Gv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature limiter gain (Kt).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

lmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ambient temperature load limit (Lmax).  Lmax is the turbine power output corresponding to the limiting exhaust gas temperature.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

loadinc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Valve position change allowed at fast rate (Loadinc).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

ltrate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum long term fuel valve opening rate (Ltrate).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pgv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 1, PU power (Pgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 2, PU power (Pgv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 3, PU power (Pgv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 4, PU power (Pgv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 5, PU power (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 6, PU power (Pgv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop (R).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0

rmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum fuel valve opening rate (Rmax).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor mechanism time constant (T1).  T1 represents the natural valve positioning time constant of the governor for small disturbances, as seen when rate limiting is not in effect.  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine power time constant (T2).  T2 represents delay due to internal energy storage of the gas turbine engine. T2 can be used to give a rough approximation to the delay associated with acceleration of the compressor spool of a multi-shaft engine, or with the compressibility of gas in the plenum of the free power turbine of an aero-derivative unit, for example.  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine exhaust temperature time constant (T3).  T3 represents delay in the exhaust temperature and load limiting system. Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lead time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lag time constant (T5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tltr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Valve position averaging time constant (Tltr).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

vmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum turbine power, PU of MWbase (Vmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum turbine power, PU of MWbase (Vmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
